Go to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Send an expense with multiline description without merchant to any user (not workspace) 3. Open the expense report 4. title: [$500] Members list becomes stale

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Needs Reproduction
labels.description: Reproducible steps needed

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
Coming from this [thread](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C07HPDRELLD/p1759992568048489), we could see customers run into an odd situation on the workspace members list, where after inviting a user to the workspace, the list was not updated immediately, only after a couple of minutes, even though the invite flow was successful.

Additionally, the owner has been showing in the list twice, even though they are a member only once. 

We were unable to reproduce this issue, but we have observed it in live video and full story sessions, indicating that certain conditions may lead to it. 

Can you identify the reproduction steps and propose a solution for this issue?

<details><summary>Issue Owner</summary>Current Issue Owner: @thesahindia</details>

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** v9.2.30-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/folder/13177080/test-cases/41237952 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** na **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** hybird **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: Precondition: user have an existing Workspace and have at least one member in the workspace 1. Launch hybrid app 2. User logged in Owner workspace 3. Navigate to workspace >> Tap "Members" 4. Tap "Invite" 5. Search for the email of an existing member of the workspace ## Expected Result: The message '${login} is already a member of ${workspace}' should still be shown after detecting that the email belongs to an existing member. ## Actual Result: The message '${login} is already a member of ${workspace}' appears briefly. User able select and invite email of an existing member of the workspace in the workspace again. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [x] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [x] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3487a138-a2b3-4d75-9a5b-23bf44eaf464 https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/905ddbec-647a-4f99-95f5-318e039c8a6f [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

title: [$250] Android - Save button floats in center of the screen after edit

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Improvement
labels.description: Item broken or needs improvement.

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
### Problem On Android, when editing an Expense description the soft keyboard animates down before the page closes, but the `Save` button remains floating in the center of the page briefly. It looks buggy and laggy. ### Solution Ensure the button aligns with the center of the screen when the soft keyboard is closed, to align with iOS. **iOS** Keyboard AND button animate to bottom of screen https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/99e404e7-612b-4383-999c-5880614ea60f **Android** Keyboard animates to bottom of screen, button hangs https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d745ae96-1e95-4cd8-937a-f81307502dae
